title: May 29, 2020 Q/A from Bridges of Meaning Community
description:
Jordan Peterson, Jonathan Pageau and John Vervaeke all have regular Q/A sessions. I've not done this because I'm not a fan of nut and bolts of that and wanted to see if we could find a better way to do it. I think this might be an improvement. 

The group that has gathered on the Bridges of Meaning Discord server has become a special community. https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU Doing the Q/A in this context seems to afford more of a flow of conversation. 

Here are the questions.  

1. Will you talk to Preston Sprinkle
2. Do atheists from non-Christian religions tend towards the kind of secular humanism proffered by Sam Harris, or do they find themselves in a different value structure due to a different cultural context? If the latter, are there any prominent examples of this?
3. Do atheists from non-Christian religions tend towards the kind of secular humanism proffered by Sam Harris, or do they find themselves in a different value structure due to a different cultural context? If the latter, are there any prominent examples of this?
4. Mercury: dump bathwater of virtue signaling without group prayer. 
5. Minneapolis riots and COVID lockdown
6. Nietzsche: 
7. Question for @PVK : Much of the IDW related truce between Christians and Atheists seemed related to the shared enemy of "wokeness". If "wokeness" goes into decline, will this alliance fray?
8. Where do you see hyper agency detection going on in the secular humanist frame right now?
9. Are there similar abstractions of other religions, in the vein of what you're describing secular humanism to be vis a vi Christianity? Or has Christianity via globalism effectively suppressed/outcompeted such developments?
10. @PVK Hello Pastor, hope you and your family is well. Question, or more of advice. I have a friend of mine, who's a pastor, thinking about starting up a "Jordan Peterson meetups" And since Jordan Peterson has been out of public discourse for awhile, is it good time to "use" Jordan's name for a meetup, or should we start something else? Thanks for your time and all that you do through YouTube channel.
11. Job: be careful with whom you share good news and bad news
At this point Job saw in the General section of the discord the message from Voth's widow that he had passed away. We spent the rest of the time in silence. 

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A
